ComicInfo.Summary: Witch Hunt Part 5: Sara tells Gleason all about the Witchblade. They go to the Curator's shop to find out information about a secret cabal of Catholic priests who plan on summoning a living god from another dimension. They are able to track down the priests but find the summoning ceremony has already begun.
